mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (buyer_id, seller_id, product_id) VALUES (#{buyerId}, #{sellerId}, #{productId})
mapper.select: SELECT room_id AS roomId, buyer_id AS buyerId, seller_id AS sellerId, product_id AS productId FROM chat_room WHERE buyer_id = #{userId} OR seller_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (room_id, sender_id, message) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{senderId}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT msg_id AS messageId, room_id AS roomId, sender_id AS senderId, message, created_at AS sendTime FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_room SET last_message = #{message}, last_message_time = NOW() WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
